about_the_game:
Welcome to Eggz - Collectible Eggs Clicker, the ultimate idle clicking game that will keep you glued to your screen! Your goal is simple: click on the egg and discover incredible skins for your eggs!

How to Play:
Click on the Egg: Each click brings you closer to unlocking a new skin. After 100 clicks, the egg will crack open.
There are 3 different possibilities:

- it can be empty
- it can drop eggz in game skin (not marketable)
- rarely can drop eggz skin in steam inventory (marketable), look for [INV] prefix on drop history.

Start unlocking unique skin. Collect all the skins and become the master of eggs!

Types of Skins:
  • Common
  • Uncommon
  • Rare
  • Epic
  • Legendary

Steam Market:
Skins can be bought and sold on the Steam market. Find the skins you're missing, sell the extras, and create your perfect collection!

Key Features:
Clicking System: Click frenetically and unlock new skins every 100 clicks.
Skin Rarities: From common to legendary, collect and showcase the rarest skins.
Lucky System: more empty eggz you find, more lucky you will be!!
Steam Market: Buy, sell, and trade skins with other players on the Steam market.

Get ready for an unprecedented clicking experience in Eggz - Collectible Eggs Clicker! Become the most famous egg collector and show the world your unique collection. Click, unlock, and collect all the skins today!

Join Our Discord Channel

name: Eggz - Collectible Eggs Clicker
short_description: Click on the Egg: after 100 clicks, the egg will crack open, and you'll unlock a unique skin. Collect all the skins and become the master of eggs! Unlock legendary skins and enrich your collection!
